Empath releases her hold on Teletran 1, but only after locking down 
all systems.  "Simmer down, lapdog, what I've done won't threaten the 
timeline - unless you insist on starting a firefight in the general 
area."  The femme reverts to her own robot mode and trains her arm 
cannons on Maxima.  "I'll warn you, 'friend', there's only two 
transformers on this entire planet I'm not above vaping.  You're not 
on that list."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> As somehow the Ark was powering down (God knows how) Teletran 1 
warned Maxima 
> again. 
> 
> Maxima transformed into her bot mode & landed on the hill summit 
across from 
> the Ark.
> 
> "LEAVE THIS AREA NOW, AUTOBOTS! IF YOU VALUE YOUR LIVES!" she 
boomed with 
> great anger in her voice. 
> 
> Her form was different from last she 'met' these bots, now a mix of 
a white 
> tiger & a hawk, a sort of TM mix with a tad BM, she shimmered in 
the sunlight. 
> The metallic wings flexed & spread out to intimidate the Bots.
> 
> Her crimson optics glowed as she growled at the Autobots below. 
then focused 
> upon Empath. 
> 
> "EMPATH! I FIND IT MORE THAN WISE THAT YOU LEAVE TELETRAN 1 ALONE & 
STOP 
> MESSING AROUND WITH THE ARK'S POWER! NOW!" She growled. "LEST YOU 
WANT THOSE IN 
> THE BRIDGE TO BE IN DANGER!" 
> 
> Her main concern was for Megatron.. of course. But she felt she had 
a duty, & 
> more to protect all of them. It didn't matter about the Autobots 
what they 
> felt or Scourge. Actually, she didn't trust anyone. Except one bot. 
> 
> She glanced behind her as the others approached. 
> 
> "LEAVE NOW! I PREPARE FOR BATTLE!"
